trigger.name: Zoomdata Heap is 75% commited on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Triggers if Zoomdata Heap committed memory is more than 75% of available heap size.

trigger.description: Triggers if Zoomdata Heap committed memory is more than 95% of available heap size.
